content:
For those that can configure the above server: in search results (e.g. try https://fhir.hl7.de/fhir/Patient ), the 'next' link contains 'localhost:8080' instead of the fhir.hl7.de server URL. Please configure/fix this..
}, {
"relation": "next",
"url": "http://localhost:8080/fhir?_getpages=9752622e-238f-4fb5-aa17-e5f68c0b9d2e&_getpagesoffset=20&_count=20&_pretty=true&_bundletype=searchset"
} ],
is already on my list, will update the server later this week
